description: Mimic Inhabitant - A Tier 2 shapeshifting creature with Shapeshifter (surprise attack), Treasure Guardian (+2 Defense in Vault), and Versatile (80% efficiency anywhere) traits, plus living trap mechanics.

userStories.title: Define Mimic YAML data with stats and traits
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Mimic defined in YAML with stats, traits, behaviors, and fusion options.
acceptanceCriteria: Mimic entry in gamedata/inhabitants/ YAML: id, name, description, sprite, tier 2
Stats: HP (medium), Attack (medium), Defense (medium), Speed (low)
Traits: Shapeshifter, TreasureGuardian (vaultDefenseBonus: 2), Versatile (efficiencyMultiplier: 0.8)
Scared behavior: Lockdown (transforms to inert object, untargetable but cannot act)
Hungry behavior: Consume (eats nearby small objects, reduces room inventory)
At least 2 fusion recipes defined
npm run gamedata:build compiles without errors
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Implement Mimic trait effects
userStories.description: As a developer, I want Mimic traits to provide gameplay effects when assigned to rooms.
acceptanceCriteria: Shapeshifter: Mimic appears as room object to invaders; on reveal gets +100% damage on first hit
Treasure Guardian: +2 Defense only when assigned to Treasure Vault room; removed when reassigned
Versatile: 80% efficiency in any room type, applied as final multiplier after other bonuses
Mimic in hallway/room entrance functions as pseudo-trap dealing damage with slow effect
Living trap does not consume trap charges; can coexist with regular traps
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Write Mimic trait unit tests
userStories.description: As a developer, I want tests verifying all Mimic trait effects.
acceptanceCriteria: Test: 80% efficiency applies universally across all room types
Test: +2 Defense in Vault only, removed when reassigned
Test: Surprise attack bonus +100% on first hit
Test: Living trap interaction with invaders
Tests in src/app/helpers/ spec file
All tests pass with npm run test
Typecheck passes
